remarks: Membership relation for the values of a function whose image is a subclass.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Apr-2017.)
statement:
funimass4f.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
funimass4f.2 $e |- F/_ x B $.
funimass4f.3 $e |- F/_ x F $.
funimass4f $p |- ( ( Fun F /\ A C_ dom F ) -> ( ( F " A ) C_ B <-> A. x e. A ( F ` x ) e. B ) ) $.
